text: Ember to Inferno was the first album from the American metalcore band Trivium. It was released on October 14, 2003 on Lifeforce Records. The lead vocalist, Matt Heafy, was 17 at the time of production. It can also be noted that "Inception the Bleeding Skies" is "A View of Burning Empires" played in reverse. ==Track listing== ==Band members== * Matt Heafy - lead vocals, vocals, rhythm guitar and classical guitar * Brent Young - bass guitar * Travis Smith - drums ==Reviews== The album received average to poor reviews. Allmusic gave it 2.5 stars. Sputnikmusic gave it only 2 out of 5. ==References== Category:Heavy metal albums
